name: Angry Balls (Domin Dev)
description:
Angry Balls is a strategy game with tower defense elements. Your task is to defend the main base from the balls. When the balls destroy the main base, you lose. The balls come in waves. The game is endless and you must survive as long as possible. you have to defend many kinds of towers and you can build mines that earn money for you.

E-mail: domin.gamedev@gmail.com
